item.title: [release]German dagger 2
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:3, topic:348176”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=444560.msg3263984#msg3263984 date=1278714460]
If I see any comments about the swastika again they shall be removed immediately, look at the geometry of the model and the skill it would’ve taken to make, not some stupid symbol.

Gratz to you for another non-flat model.
I’d make the handle a little more round.
[/quote]
I tried to make the handle a bit more round but it didn’t fit O.o[/quote]
Try to bevel the edges of the handle.

item.title: [release]German dagger 2
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:9, topic:348176”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=444560.msg3264151#msg3264151 date=1278725320]
Again > Swastika = NOT FUCKING GERMAN

Although, the angle you have it at, its the Buddhist symbol of luck.
http://viewonbuddhism.org/general_symbols_buddhism.html#6
[/quote]It was the symbol of luck everywhere until Hitler came along.

@Topic
The design is nice, but there is a hell of a lot of unneeded polygons in the handle and hilt. Just shape a primitive cylinder to your liking instead and you’ll be fine.

Also, you should downsize it so it looks more like a dagger than a sword Maybe even flip it.[/quote]

I am just tired of it being associated with Germans. Believe it or not, I have decent from Spain, Europe, Ireland, Germany, some in Italy. I’m a fucking mut, and im proud of it. Lulz

Read full topic

item.title: [release]German dagger 2
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:8, topic:348176”]Again > Swastika = NOT FUCKING GERMAN

Although, the angle you have it at, its the Buddhist symbol of luck.
http://viewonbuddhism.org/general_symbols_buddhism.html#6[/quote]It was the symbol of luck everywhere until Hitler came along.

@Topic
The design is nice, but there is a hell of a lot of unneeded polygons in the handle and hilt. Just shape a primitive cylinder to your liking instead and you’ll be fine.

Also, you should downsize it so it looks more like a dagger than a sword Maybe even flip it.

Read full topic

@the_elve_age wrote:

pivotgamer84:

You should also make it look more like a dagger (scale it down) because it kind of looks like a short-sword.

It looks too pink on the handle. (poly overkill)

item.title: [release]German dagger 2
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

Well since i got flamed for naming my other dagger “Nazi dagger” I changed the name to German dagger -.-
Anyway i re-made my old dagger

Here it is:




I know it’s not that good,i rushed it.

Link: http://uppit.com/nh6ns9j7fziu/Models.rar
Ints: if(i == 8140) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 12347; //Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 1200; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 16; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 12348; //Male class8.anInt200 = 12348; //Female class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.aString170 = "German dagger"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Made by Mr mopar".getBytes(); }

[size=6pt]I in no-way like Nazis, but I do think there weapons are bad ass.[/size]

Read full topic
